references:
Notations: Bold lowercase letters refer to column vectors.
𝔼​(⋅)𝔼⋅\mathbb{E}(\cdot) denotes the expectation operation; the superscript T𝑇T represents the transpose operation; ∇∇\nabla is the gradient operator, and (x)+≜max⁡{0,x}≜superscript𝑥0𝑥(x)^{+}\triangleq\max\{0,x\}.
For a set 𝒜𝒜\mathcal{A}, |𝒜|𝒜|\mathcal{A}| denotes its cardinality.
‖𝒂‖norm𝒂\|\bm{a}\| denotes the Euclidean norm of vector 𝒂𝒂\bm{a}. 𝐈𝐈\bf I denotes the identity matrix.
For ease of reference, the main notations used in this paper are listed in Table I.
